mods.name: Sarge 100k Stack Size
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: changes stack sizes for most every stackable item in game to 100k

mods.name: Sarge Basic Saddle Improvements
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: improves the basic riding saddle to have more cargo space and multiple buffs to the animal it's equipped onto.

mods.name: Sarge Better Backpacks
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: adds a ''Hercules'' backpack that can be crafted which has enormous carry weight and weight reducer buffs on it.

mods.name: Sarge Better Basic Animal Feed
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: adds a small food consumption reduction buff and removes the spoilage timer on the basic seed & wheat animal feed.

mods.name: Sarge Better Difficulty Levels
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: increases animal's perception range on all 3 difficulties as well as removing the 3 death limit on hard difficulty.

mods.name: Sarge Better Tamed Animals
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: increases the xp buff for recently petted animals and raises their max level to 200

mods.name: Sarge Better Wood Buildings
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: adds some buffs to various wood structures as well as swapping materials on reinforced wood to using nails (from beeswax) and on interior wood to beeswax (from nails)

mods.name: Sarge Custom Crafting
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: adds a new Sarge crafting bench (anvil mesh) that the character can hand craft and a bunch of new items that can be made on the new bench. multiple new suit modules that can be crafted as well as an improved lantern and various other items.

mods.name: Sarge Deployable Slots Changes
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: increases the slot counts in many storages and reduces slots in many craft stations making storages more useful instead of using craft stations as storages.

mods.name: Sarge Envirosuit
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: modifies the basic suit to have 8 module slots as well as more storage, weight, and some buffs as well.

mods.name: Sarge Fish Trap Changes
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: makes fish traps a little more logical and easier to craft as well as better chances on the fish they can catch.

mods.name: Sarge New Foods
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: adds fruit juices made from watermelons and berries with buffs to go with them as well as dried pumpkin as a cheap trailfood to carry with you while exploring.

mods.name: Sarge Reinforced Stone Buildings
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: adds reinforced versions of the stone structures with increased ingredient costs.

mods.name: Sarge Slower Decaying Animal Carcasses
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: animal carcasses no longer decay so you will find half eaten ones or skeletons scattered around as you wander. pairs super well with SalJam's AI Adjustments mod for increased wild animal interactions.

mods.name: Sarge Slower Food Spoilage
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: increases the spoilage timers for various food items. most were roughly doubled.

mods.name: Sarge Stronger Reinforced Buildings
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: beefs up the ''reinforced'' buff applied to buildings so that it has better health and weather resistances.

mods.name: Sarge Stronger Spikey Spikes
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: increases the hedgehod spike damage modifier from 25% to 1000% for near instant kills. be careful!

mods.name: Sarge Well Rested XP Buff
mods.author: Sarge
mods.description: adds a 200% experience buff to the existing well rested bonus from sleeping, incentivizing sleeping every night.
